https://tmrev.io/movie/96054-Bangkok Loco 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kfpKYctAiDb2OrKZxEJ0uhHctUr.jpg The story involves a gifted young rock drummer named Bay who commits a grisly murder and becomes a fugitive from the law. Trained by a monk in a style of drumming called the Drums of the Gods, which treats drumming as a martial art for the forces of good, he must face his opposite drummer from the dark side. Bangkok Loco
